#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,l,count;char a;
    cin>>t;
    
    for(j=0;j<t;j++)
    {
              count=1;
    char me[100];
    cin>>me;
    l=strlen(me);
    char A[3]={'A','B','C'},D[3]={'D','E','F'},G[3]={'G','H','I'},J[3]={'J','K','L'},M[3]={'M','N','O'},P[4]={'P','Q','R','S'};
    char T[3]={'T','U','V'},W[4]={'W','X','Y','Z'};
            for(i=0;i<l;i++)
            {
                            if(me[i]==me[i+1])
                            count++;
                            else 
                            {
                                 if(me[i]=='2')
                                 cout<<A[count-1];
                                 else if(me[i]=='3')
                                 cout<<D[count-1];
                                 else if(me[i]=='4')
                                 cout<<G[count-1];
                                 else if(me[i]=='5')
                                 cout<<J[count-1];
                                 else if(me[i]=='6')
                                 cout<<M[count-1];
                                 else if(me[i]=='7')
                                 cout<<P[count-1];
                                 else if(me[i]=='8')
                                 cout<<T[count-1];
                                 else if(me[i]=='9')
                                 cout<<W[count-1];
                                 else if(me[i]=='0')
                                 cout<<" ";
                                 count=1;
                                 }
                            }
                            cout<<endl;
            }
    
            return 0;
    }
